description:
Tanner is a viewer who sent us some pictures of himself wearing nothing but a Sean Cody tank top. His pictures caught my attention because 1) he's really cute and 2) we had only made a few of those tank tops so it was kind of a mystery as to where he had gotten it from.

I gave him a call and he was really nice on the phone. He had met one of our models at a promotion we were doing and that's who had given him the tank top. Tanner had always wanted to do film and speaking with our model prompted him to write.

Fast forward to him arriving a few week later. OK, let me just say that this guy has a nice ass— in fact, a really nice ass. He's young and not very experienced sexually but it's not hard to tell that he loves to get fucked...
title: Tanner
